channel.title: Engine Error
channel.description: So, QEPD just hit 200% entdata, and upon compiling this happens: [img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/260468787722319802/CA4BF40C4F3E60E103B540C2CFB457F4CDFA10A4/[/img]It was my understanding that the latest round of updates increased the ent budget to around 400% of maximum, and even before the update it could go a little above 200% with nothing weird happening.

item.title: Engine Error
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
Ok, so it looks like these maps can be loaded by running the game outside of Hammer. That has officially downgraded the issue from fatal to merely cumbersome. Will keep playing around with this.

Read full topic
